title: Shaping of Eyebrows
description: Eyebrow shaping can be done by waxing or threading technique to remove hair around the eyebrows and shape them to the face. Eyebrow tinting can be done to add a tint to the eyebrow to enhance the color of the eyebrows.Â  Eyebrow shaping, tinting, waxing or threading will emphasize your eyes, and enhance your facial features.
